    • Uses of IWeightNoise in org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.weightnoise

      Classes in org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.weightnoise that implement IWeightNoise 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DropConnect
      DropConnect, based on Wan et. al 2013 - "Regularization of Neural Networks using DropConnect"
      Sets weights randomly to 0 with some probability, or leaves them unchanged.
      class  WeightNoise
      Apply noise of the specified distribution to the weights at training time.
      Methods in org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.weightnoise that return IWeightNoise 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IWeightNoise IWeightNoise.clone()
